Ingredients.1: 1 (8 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped

Ingredients.2: 1 (8 ounce) container cream cheese-style spread (such as Kite Hill™), room temperature

Ingredients.9: 1 cup grated Parmesan-style vegan cheese (such as Follow Your Heart®)

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Mix artichoke hearts, cream cheese spread, spinach, flour, garlic salt, thyme, and red pepper flakes together in a large bowl.

Directions.3: Coat a large nonstick baking pan with cooking spray; fill pan with the artichoke mixture.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until center is hot and dip is bubbling, about 25 minutes.

Directions.5: Sprinkle the top of the dip with Parmesan-style cheese.
